title: Yes, Giorgio
creator_credit: Franklin J. Schaffner, Peter Fetterman, United Artists Corporation and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A romantic comedy about an opera singer who loses his voice, the beautiful doctor who helps him find it, and the love affair which results. Includes an extensive segment from the opera, Turandot. Stars Luciano Pavarotti as Giorgio, Kathryn Harrold and Eddie Albert. Original music composed and conducted by Michael J. Lewis. Contains some scenes in Italian with English subtitles.
